blocks.text: Games Available to Play at Pickering Casino

Single-event, spread, total, player prop, and parlay wagers are available. All wagers are handled via the provincially approved wagering system for accurate odds and rapid ticket validation. The sportsbook has comfy seats and many screens broadcasting live games and updated odds so players can watch and bet. Casino payout stations allow fast redemption of winnings.
Bonuses and Promotions at Pickering Casino

Anyone who signs up for a rewards card on the site can enter drawings, earn points that can be redeemed, and get deals that are tailored to their game habits.
